Estimated Delivery Time: 3-5 Working Days

As each piece is handmade from scratch, we will do our best to meet these dispatch estimates!

settings.heading: Care Instructions
settings.content:
Guidance

Please DO NOT water any of the moss pieces as this will damage them.

All our plants and mosses have been naturally preserved using food-grade ingredients. The preservation process ensures that the plants and mosses maintain their original characteristics at the point of harvest without the effort and costs involved in order to maintain them.

Spaces to avoid:

1. Avoid constant, intense sunlight and direct lighting (i.e. halogen lights at close proximity)
2. Avoid very high (>70%) or very low (<30%) air humidity.
3. Never hang these pieces near fireplaces, heating units or other heat sources.
4. Avoid areas of flowing water or where pieces are exposed to being splashed by water.
